resources.string: Welcome to Loner, learn how to find consolation in times of hopelessness and distress. Key points to note: a)Being alone does not necessarily mean you are lonely. b)You can still be happy when you are alone. c)You matter. Don\'t listen to what the world says. d)Happiness begins with you.
Once you realise happiness comes from within, life becomes a whole lot better
You have no idea what the app is all about? Don\'t worry, just click on the little icon below. You do not have to register or login to know what we are about.
